professional_summary: Hard working and energetic management professional focused on customer satisfaction throughout all stages of the sales life cycle. Proven experience in business development and administrative management with strong leadership and communication skills.

work_experience.description: Led business development initiatives and managed customer relationships while overseeing sales operations
responsibilities: Resolve customer complaints regarding sales and service
Determine price schedules and discount rates
Review operational records and reports to project sales
Monitor customer preferences to determine focus of sales efforts
Direct and coordinate activities involving sales of manufactured products
Represent company at trade association meetings
Advise dealers and distributors on policies and operating procedures

work_experience.description: Managed administrative operations and financial record-keeping
responsibilities: Direct and coordinate supportive services department
Prepare and review operational reports and schedules
Hire and terminate clerical and administrative personnel
Manage financial records and accounting tasks
